title: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
desc: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
org: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING CHANCE OF RAINFALL TODAY?
Only Female flower no Male flower
TELL ME CONTROL FRUIET BORAR IN GRAM.
#    HOW TO CORRECT THE DEFICIENCY OF MANGANESE IN THE WHEAT CROP ?
records.KccAns: A:   SPRAY OF MANGANESE SULPHATE @ 1 KG IN THE 200 LITRES OF WATER/ACRE

records.QueryText: TELL ME MANDI RATE OF GOWAR

records.KccAns: RAIN FALL UP TO 5 DAYS IN YOUR DISTRICT

records.QueryText: How much does of Urea in Wheat Crop ?
records.KccAns: Does of Urea in Wheat Crop are : 4 Kg / Kannal .
sprey Mencozeb + Carbindazim (Saaf or  sixer)@ 30 g /pump and Spray of 19:19:19 NPK Fertilizer @ 1.5-2kg/Acre.

records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING FOR SUITABLE TIME OF THE MAGANESE SULPHATE SPRAY IN WHEAT & DOSE  PER ACRE OF IT?
records.KccAns: 10TH DAY AFTER 1ST IRRIGATION IS SUITABLE TIME OF THE MAGANESE SULPHATE SPRAY IN WHEAT  & DOSE  PER ACRE OF IT IS-1KG/ACRE.

records.QueryText: TELL ME TERMITE CONTROL OF WHEAT
records.KccAns: USE CHLOROPYRIFOS 20% EC 4 LITER PER HA WITH IRRIGATION FOR TERMITE CONTROL
apply urea 40 kg + superphosphate 225 kg + potash 80kg /acre

records.QueryText: CONTROL OF LATE BLIGHT IN POTATO
records.KccAns: SPRAY COPPER OXY CHLORIDE 50% WP @ 4GM/LIT. OF WATER

records.QueryText: as for wheat fertilizer dose as a base dose application
records.KccAns: suggest: in wheat give 120:60:00 npk kg/ha as a base dose application

records.QueryText: Information regarding how to control Nematode problem in wheat?
records.KccAns: Broadcast 13 kg. Carbofuran or 10 kg. Regent per acre.

records.QueryText: how to control thrips in garlic crop?
INFORMATION REGARDING DOSE OF UREA IN WHEAT?
records.KccAns: DOSE OF UREA IN WHEAT 100 KG/ACRE.
Sulfosulfuron 75% + Metsulfuran Methyl 5% WG @ 16 GRAM/ACRE KI DAR SE CHHIDKAAV KARE
Spray quinalphos 25 EC 2ml / lit of water

records.QueryText: TELL ME CONTROL YELLOW LEAVES COLOUR IN WHEAT CROP.
